item.title: Noob Needs Help!
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Wow… GET SRL!!!
Those procedures will get you banned, and oh yea, dont set up your username and pass as a CONST, ill give you a procedure that will make your life easier.

[scar]{----------Areithe’s Chicken Hunter and Feather Farmer----------}
program ChickenFeatherHunter;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
// ^^^ GET THAT!
// www.villu-reborn.com <— To download SRL.

//THIS is where you place your username and password, get SRL, Can’t
//you see how much easier it is??
//----------------------------------------------------------------------//
//----------------------------------------------------------------------//
procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1; // Set Number of Players here.
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers); // Sets the Players Array Length;
CurrentPlayer := 0; // CurrentPlayer = Array Index

Players[0].Name := ‘’; //Username
Players[0].Pass := ‘’; //Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘’; //3 or 4 letters username
Players[0].Loc := ‘’; //Leave as blank
Players[0].Skill := ‘’; //The skill for when you get a lamp
Players[0].Active := True;

writeln(inttostr(HowManyPlayers) + ' Players');

end;
//----------------------------------------------------------------------//
//----------------------------------------------------------------------//

begin

SetUpSRL;
DeclarePlayers;

If Not(LoggedIn)Then LoginPlayer;
If(LoggedIn)Then
Begin

Writeln(‘your player has been logged in…)’
TerminateScript;

end;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Needs Help!
item.dc:creator: @Areithe Areithe
item.description:
@Areithe wrote:

Ok, I’m trying to create a chicken killer that picks up feathers when you kill 'em, and so far I have that much. My problem is, I’m trying to get the mouse to click on the “existing user” button right before you log into runescape, and I’m having a really hard time getting it to work.
P.S. Just ignore the writeusernameandpass function and pretty much everything to do with it.

[code]{----------Areithe’s Chicken Hunter and Feather Farmer----------}
program ChickenFeatherHunter;
const
username=’?’; //Input username here. (Replace the ?)
password=’?’; //Input password here. (Replace the ?)
colortoclick = 15029504;
var
x, y, clicks: Integer;
procedure Login;
begin
(findcolor(x, y, colortoclick, 406, 378, 536, 402))
movemousesmooth(x,y,);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
procedure writeusernameandpass;
begin
writeln(username)
writeln(password)
end;

begin
login;
writeusernameandpass;
end.[/code]

Read full topic
